content: (kurbaana samayatthu basmalkkoyude shesham manorttho yil ninnu kurishedutthukondu ellaavarum koodi pallllikku chuttum aaghoshapoorvvam sleebaayude ekbokallo, kolokallo chollikkondu oru pradakshinam nadatthiya shesham madbahaayilo, beemaayilo ninnukondu sleebaa aaghosham nadatthunnu.)

Thante vadhatthaal melullllavarkku shaantinalkiya samaadhaanavum thante bali samarppanatthaal thaazheyulllla vare ramyamaakkiya nirappum thante sleebaayaal vijaathee yare rakshicha rakshithaavum thante punaruththhaanatthaal bhinni chirunnavare samyojippicha snehavum aaya kartthaave! Ninte svargaarohana divasatthil bhoothala tthile kalahatthe shamippikkaname. Ellaavidha upadrava ngallilninnum ninte sleebaayaal nyangalle kaatthuko llllaname. Nyangall ninneyum ninte pithaavineyum vishuddha roohaayeyum ippozhum eppozhum ennekkum sthothram cheyyumaaraakaname.

Naathhaa! Karunaa-sampannaa!
Ninnude punaruththhaanamathum
Ninnude svargaarohanavum
Kondaadum perunnaallukallil
Ninmaanatthinu yogyamathaam
Vachanangalle nyaan paadeedum
Ninsleebaayaal rakshitharaam
Purajaathikallipperunnaallil
Sthuthiyaal keertthikkum ninne
Nyangallumarththhichothunnu.

Nyangallude mishihaa thampuraane! Ninte punaruththhaanatthil nyangall santoshichu aahlaadikkukayum ninte svargaarohanatthil nyangall aanandikkukayum cheyyu nnu. Ninte nirappum samaadhaanavum nyangallil vaazhumaaraaka name. Ninte snehavum preethiyum nyangallil vasippikkaname. Ninte sleebaaye vandikkuvaanum ninte punaruththhaanatthe ettuparayuvaanum ninte svargaarohanatthil aanandikkuvaanum nyangallkku krpa nalkaname. Nyangalleyum nyangallude marichupoyavareyum ninte raajya tthil aanandippikkaname. Nyangallude kartthaavum nithya daivavume! Ninte karthrthvatthe nyangall sthuthi kkukayum cheyyumaaraakaname.

Uththhaanatthin paramaarththham
Bodhappettellaavarkkum
Engkilumathilaa moodajanam
Hanta nishedhamuyartthunnu.
Yoodajanatthaal krooshithano
mahimayodakkabareenneri
Athulaaghoshatthodinnaall
Svargaaroham cheyyunnu
Praarththhanayodadhunaa nyangall arththhicheevidhamothunnu.

Daivamaaya kartthaave! Ninte sleebaayude paarshva ngallil maraykkappeduvaanum ninte punaruththhaanatthil sadya shyaraayittheeruvaanum ninte uyirppilum svargaaroha natthilum vishvasikkuvaanum ninte evangeliyo nile kalpanakalle aacharikkuvaanum ninte ishdam pravartthikkuvaanum ninte nyaayapramaanam anushdhikku vaanum ninne snehichavaraaya neethimaanmaarudeyum punyavaanmaarudeyum praarththhanakallil abhayam praapichu sahaayam labhikkuvaanum nyangalle yogyaraakkaname. Ava rude apekshakallmoolam nyangallkkum nyangallude pare tharkkum paapaparihaaram nalkaname. Nyangall ninneyum ninte pithaavineyum parishuddha roohaayeyum ippozhum eppozhum ennekkum sthothram cheyyumaaraakaname.

Kartthaave! Nin janathathime
Laardratha kaanicheedaname.
Thaavakamaamavakaashatthil
Leshamajaagratha kaattaruthe
Nin sleebaayin van kodiyaal
Kraisthavamakudamuyartthaname.
Prarththhanayodadhunaa nyangall arththhicheevidhamothunnu.

Daivamaaya kartthaave! Ninte ee svargaaro hanadivasatthe svargeeya sainyangallodorumichu pukazhtthuvaan nyangalle yogyaraakkaname. Aanandapoorvvam ninte perunnaallukall kondaadi ninnilninnu nanmakallum anugrahangallum praapikkuvaanum nyangalle arharaakkaname. Ninte vishuddha sleebaayaalum vishuddhanmaaril vasi chirikkunna ninte shakthiyaalum kopatthinte vadikallum sakala shikshakallum nyangallilninnu neekkikkallayaname. Nyangall ninneyum ninte pithaavineyum vishuddha roohaayeyum ippozhum eppozhum ennekkum sthuthichu sthothram cheyyumaaraakaname.

Peedithanum rogaartthannum
Saadhuvinum dhanaheenannum
Gathiyattonum vidhavaykkum
thunayaayu naathhan menmayezhum
Thanshaantiyeyee janathayilum
Sabhayithilum nivasippikkaan
Praarththhanayodadhunaa nyangall arththhicheevidhamothunnu.

Pattakkaaran:-
Doothanmaar se-vippone!
Eeshaa! Nee parishuddhan.
Kaabenmaar vaazhtthunnone!
Shakthaa! Nee parishuddhan
Sraappikall kaadee-shaarppone!
Mrthiheenaa! Nee parishuddhan
Paapikallanuthaapatthodottharththhichothunnu.
Nyangallkkaayu svargaaroodhaa! Krpacheyyenam.

Theemayar haalal-cholvone!
Eeshaa! Nee parishuddhan
Aathmeeyar shlaa-ghippone
Shakthaa! Nee parishuddhan
Manmayaraagho-shippone!
Mrthiheenaa! Nee parishuddhan
Vishvaasiniyaam thirusabhathan-suthararththhikkunnu.
Nyangallkkaayu svargaaroodhaa! Krpacheyyenam.

Melullllaar maa-nippone!
Eeshaa! Nee parishuddhan.
Maddhyamar keertthikkunnone!
Shakthaa! Nee parishuddhan.
Keezhullllor koo-ppunnone!
Mrthiheenaa! Nee parishuddhan
Paapikallanuthaapatthodottharththhichothunnu
Nyangallkkaayu svargaaroodhaa! Krpacheyyenam.

Naathhaa! Krpacheytheedenam.
Naathhaa! Krpacheyyuka kanivaal
Naathhaa! Karmmaarththhanakalle nee kaikkondum krpacheytheedenam
Deveshaa! The thothram
Srashdaave! The sthothram
Paapikallaam daasarilaliyum mishihaa raajaave! Sthothram.
